channel.title: [PI] Stupid bug makes people relog after they bank to trade
channel.description: I can't find the problem. After someone uses the bank, the server dosen't notice that they aren't banking anymore and when you try to trade after banking it says you cant trade while banking. If i remove that blocking statement, it allows a dupe to work and i dont want anything like that. How would I fix this? >.<

item.title: [PI] Stupid bug makes people relog after they bank to trade
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:4, topic:415303”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=517255.msg3756952#msg3756952 date=1316552345]
Its the same as anyother shit PI out there…
[/quote]

I gotta shit PI and mine dose not logg out after trade…[/quote]I ment the statements…

Read full topic
